name: BattleRoyale
description: Transforms a Roll20 Campaign into a Battle Royale, playable without a GM present, so that everyone can take part!

useroptions.name: Page Prefix
useroptions.description: Only allow the !map command to show and change to maps starting with this. eg. '[BR]Arena'. Can be empty if you want it to work everywhere.

useroptions.name: Allow Character Claiming
useroptions.description: Allow players to use the command !claim to gain control over a character in the journal.

useroptions.name: Visible Spectators
useroptions.description: Should the spectator tokens be visible to contestants and other spectators?

useroptions.name: Show Health Bars
useroptions.description: Make a contestants health bar visible to other players. Only tested using the Roll20 5e Sheet

useroptions.name: Initial Token Vision
useroptions.description: How far can tokens see when created.

useroptions.name: Grant Vision Range
useroptions.description: Range of vision granted by the 'Grant Vision' token macro. If set to 0 'Grant Vision' macro will be removed.

useroptions.name: Sound Ping Radius
useroptions.description: Range of randomness for sound pings. Default is a random location within 200 pixels of the center of the token. Default tile size is 70 pixels.
